overview: Kang Qing from Chenlu Township is in love with Geng Fei, the rich girl. Disregarding his parents' opposition, Geng Fei went to Chenlu and Kangqing to restore the wood kiln process. However, Kang Qing died in a car accident. In order to fulfill the lover's last wish, with the help of Kang Qing's father, Geng Fei finally succeeded in firing the best kiln products, fulfilling the wishes of generations.
title: I'll Wait for You
